name: owntracks-recorder
description: OwnTracks Recorder is a lightweight self-hosted server for storing and accessing location data from OwnTracks apps. It allows replaying and visualizing historical location events with a minimal UI.
features: Analytics Dashboard: Visual metrics and usage statistics with customizable charts to track performance and user engagement.
Mobile Optimization: Responsive design with touch-friendly interfaces and offline sync capabilities for seamless mobile access.
Notification System: Configurable alerts via email, push, or in-app notifications to keep users informed of important updates.
Theme Customization: Multiple UI themes and layout options with custom branding support to match organizational identity.
Backup Automation: Scheduled backups with encryption and cloud storage integration to ensure data protection and disaster recovery.
